sub_title: Project Manager at Cognizant - Automation (Selenium Java Script, CICD, DevOps)
summary:
• 09 years of experience in software testing in automating functional GUI and API tests with both open source and licensed test tools.
• In the last one year, developed test automation for Selenium and Robot Framework using Docker-Container technology and integrating complete solution with Git and Jenkins to achieve continues and parallel test executions
• Automated API Testing using Newman and rest assured. Set up service virtualization for functional and Performance testing.
• Developed a web portal for application health checkup using Angular JS, Java Script, and Bootstrap. Extended this solution with Splunk.
• Deep understanding on selenium web driver json protocol.
• Web and mobile apps testing: In last one-year, automated web GUI tests using robot test framework (python) and vanilla selenium/Appium.
• Extensive hands-on experience in writing Junit tests to test the code using detailed assertions and performing incremental integration testing.
• Strong knowledge and experience with CI/CD tool: Jenkins in enabling continuous tests after each code delivery within small sprints.
• 8 years of hands-on experience in developing automated tests, developing, and setting up of automation test frameworks such as data driven, key word driven using Selenium (Java) and HP Unified functional testing (UFT/QTP).
• Implemented Behavior Driven Development (BDD) and Continuous testing using Junit, Cucumber (Selenium) and integrating test suites with Jenkins for two mobile applications development for Proximus Client.
• Thinking and Designing platform agnostic test solutions is part of my personality.
• Strong debugging skills, ability to find the bug in the code and working collaboratively with the developer in getting the issues fixed at fast pace.
• Delivered projects with focus on shift left test automation and Combined Acceptance Testing (CAT) for ABN AMRO Client.
• Hands-on experience in performing load tests using Apache JMeter as part of Jenkins pipeline.
• Ability to co-ordinate with multiple software vendors and UAT business testers.
• Excellent problem-solving skills with focus on quality delivery.
• Performed Selenium - Neoload integration to have one single script working for both functional and nonfunctional testing.
• Expertise in software life cycle management, testing concepts, capable of identifying and managing the risks throughout the different testing phases.
• Implemented Mainframe automation using Selenium and integrated with CICD.

projects.title: ABN AMRO Bank N.V., IT International TREQ Team
projects.description:
ABN AMRO IT International TREQ team was formed as a central team to support all scrum teams working in Core banking department (16 teams) and Investment department (8 teams) to establish Automation testing, Performance testing, service virtualization and REST API testing. Provide test automation framework, test automation reusable components, implement testing CICD as part of DevOps and Perform proof of concepts of different automation and performance tools was area of work for TREQ team.

Roles & Responsibilities-
• Working in devops environment and responsible for user stories development together with the team and developing automated test cases in each sprint.
• Writing scalable automated API tests and GUI tests with focus on data driven testing and detailed assertions.
• Automated API testing using newman (Postman’s CLI tool) and rest-assured in combination with Junit5.
• Developed unit test cases using Junit5 for CI integration and setup runtime environment using docker containers.
• Part of TCD (Temenos Cloud Deployment) program to implement solution to execute Selenium test cases in parallel using Docker container under TCD.
• Used robot framework and python scripting to automate GUI and non-GUI test cases and integration is done with XLR and Jenkins.
• Responsible for running the Jenkins jobs to execute the automated tests and to work with peers to debug/fix the defects identified.
• Integrated the automated tests execution with in CICD pipeline using Jenkins Master-slave architecture.
• Evaluating and updating the effectiveness of the existing regression suite by analyzing the test results.
• Identifying risks and keeping the Product owner and impacted stake holders duly informed.
• Setting up suitable test strategy based on the technology stack and based on the requirements.
• Part of ABN AMRO ORS (One Release Strategy) program to establish daily deployment and overnight test execution to get defect as fast and in early stage of development.

contributors.headline: Project Manager at Cognizant - Automation (Selenium Java Script, CICD, DevOps)

projects.title: ABN AMRO Bank N.V. TripleA Automation Regression Setup For Channels Agile Test Center (CATC)
projects.description:
ABN AMRO CATC (Channels Agile Test Centre) project was introduced to set base automation regression setup for Temenos Triple-A Product. Triple-A product is used by the client relationship manager to maintain portfolio of high net worth clients. Triple product is also used to create portfolio strategy and proposal for investment to the end client. Triple-A applications are built on C, C++ language and had desktop version for user interface, due to this there was no automation setup available for Triple-A applications

Roles and Responsibilities:-
• Worked as an automation tester and in later as automation consultant to implement automation regression setup for Triple-A applications.
• Worked on Sikuli Selenium, HP UFT and AutoIT to automate applications.
• Transformation from Manual testing to test automation within Investments & Channel – Triple-A, Product Approval Tool, IAC & CRM.
• Developed progression and regression automated tests using HP QTP/UFT and Selenium (Java for web apps and cross browser testing).
• Developed excel based utility using VB script to perform file comparison (text, excel, xml, pdf, csv, flat).
• Maintained requirements, test cases and defect life cycle in HP ALM
• Received appreciated award from Client/ Stake holders on successful implementation of automation as this was the first time Triple-A application were automated by any team.
• Managed development of test scripts, test conditions, test data and expected results for one or more test streams, including unit, assembly, integration product, performance, UAT and operational acceptance tests.
• Mentoring the new testers, making a good documentation and version controlling of the automation tests.

projects.title: ABN AMRO Bank N.V., IT Domestic Access Online (AOL)
projects.description:
Access online (AOL) is a portfolio of applications catering to the front office of Global Electronics Banking domains of ABN AMRO. Corporate customers of ABN AMRO bank mainly use these applications to initiate, authorize and release payments using OPP. Access online contains web-based solutions, integrating the robust online payments, balance and transaction reporting platform facilitating the end-customers of ABN AMRO to effectively manage payments. It also includes a dedicated channel for bulk payments called Access Bulk Channels (ABC) which enables the clients to make bulk payments

Roles & Responsibilities-
• Worked as QA Automation tester and single point of contact to the client, onshore functional test team and other periphery stakeholders for the automation testing activities.
• Involved in creation of test plan and test strategy
• Extensive experience in developing test automation framework including estimation, planning, design, and Developing test Scenarios/ test cases for all functional requirements.
• Experience with web services testing of the middleware applications Cordys and Fusion middleware using SOAP UI.
• Developed progression and regression automated tests using HP QTP/UFT and Selenium (Java for web apps and cross browser testing).
• Managed development of test scripts, test conditions, test data, and expected results for one or more test streams, including unit, assembly, integration product, performance, UAT and operational acceptance tests.
• Prepared Reporting to Clients and Release Management on Test execution and defect status on daily basis.
• Participating in the release control process (when the application is transferred from the build team to the test team) to ensure that solutions meet business requirements
